A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Glad I saw it\, but very glad I only paid ITunes $5.99 to rent.  Near-unwatchable snooze fest\, save for the final 30 minutes or so.  What they did to Luke Skywalker's character would approximate revealing George Washington and Abraham Lincoln as Al Qaida sympathizers.  But\, I'm glad to learn the name is actually Kylo Ren.  All this time I thought it was Ky Lauren\, great-great-great-great grandfather of Ralph Lauren.  THAT would have made a better plot twist than the ones in this flaming x-wing fighter wreck of a movie.
